entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How to use CancellationToken with HttpClient #106558
    Future
  • Test failure: "Internal consistency check failed" in System.Security.Cryptography.Dsa.Tests.DSASignVerify_Stream.InvalidKeySize_DoesNotInvalidateKey #106556
  • ILLink doesn't warn for annotation mismatch for derived method implementing a recursive interface #106552
    Future
  • JIT: Debug/Release diff on ARM32 #106551
  • JIT: Debug/Release diff for `AdvSimd.ShiftRightLogicalNarrowingLower` #106546
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed '(emitThisGCrefRegs & regMask) == 0' during 'Emit code' #106545
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'node->AsMultiOp()->GetOperandCount() == 2' during 'Assertion prop' #106544
    10.0.0
  • ICorProfilerCallback GC related behavior changed in CoreCLR 8.0? #106543
  • System.Numerics.Tensors Should omit `.Reshape` function. #106539
    9.0.0
  • System.Numerics.Tensors Non-monotonic constructor errors #106538
    9.0.0
  • System.Numerics.Tensors Inconsistent TryFlattenTo & TryBroadcastTo vs TryCopyTo #106537
    9.0.0
  • System.Numerics.Tensors Incorrect IndexOutOfRangeException on empty slice #106536
    9.0.0
  • System.Numerics.Tensors SetSlice safety #106535
    9.0.0
  • System.Numerics.Tensors constructor safety #106534
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: `ToString(...)` overloads for `Array`, `Array<T>`, `Memory<T>`, `Span<T>` for pretty printing underlying contents/elements and maybe a new general `System.Print(...)`/`System.PrettyPrint(...)` #106531
    Future
  • Expression.Property() throws System.ArgumentException: 'The method 'X' is not a property accessor (Parameter 'propertyAccessor')' #106530
  • UnmanagedCallersOnly methods crash at runtime without relink #106529
    10.0.0
  • Android - With set Turkish locale "i".ToUpper() is giving 'I" instead of 'İ' #106560
  • [API Proposal]: Expose MemoryStream.InternalReadSpan() as a public method #106524
    Future
  • wasi interop failed to work after .net 9 preview 7 release #106523
    10.0.0
  • Httpwebrequest Cause program crash in runtime 8.0.5,Windows Server 2012 R2 Datacenter #106522
  • windows-arm64 release CrossAOT_Mono crossaot builds failing on Windows headers #106521
    9.0.0

Closed

  • .NET 9 Preview 7 - LLVM-related build failure #105516
    9.0.0
  • AV in runtime when catching exception thrown in other ALC with new EH on win-arm64 #105483
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed `gtCostsInitialized` during `Determine first cold block` #106484
    10.0.0
  • Arm64/Sve Test: Inputs for LoadVector API test #101475
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed '!m_b2->IsLast()' during 'Optimize bools' #106487
    9.0.0
  • Test failure baseservices\\exceptions\\stackoverflow\\stackoverflowtester\\stackoverflowtester.cmd #84911
    9.0.0
  • Occasionally hitting error MSB6006: "csc.dll" exited with code 139 on linux (w/ GCDynamicAdaptationMode=1) #104123
    9.0.0
  • Internal Package vulnerabilities referenced #106528
  • Support equivalent of IQueryable<ComposablePartDefinition> Parts in System.Composition #24763
  • Move to zlib-ng for better CPU intrinsics support (ARM64 performance) #87560
    Future
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'ins != INS_invalid' during 'Generate code' #106478
  • ConfigurationBinder Source Generator doesn't support IEnumerable types with same functionality as reflection based binder #96652
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix KMAC tests on Azure Linux #106565
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement
  • Use FeatureSwitchDefinition in a few places #106564
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix up docs #106563
    area-Meta
  • [RISC-V] Fix GenerateResolveStub #106562
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Adjust the vector docs to use langword instead of cref to preserve generic type information where relevant #106561
    area-System.Numerics
  • [JIT] Enable EGPRs in JIT by adding REX2 encoding to the backend. #106557
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: fix unused operand marking in LowerHWIntrinsicTernaryLogic #106555
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix GetTargetPath hook point #106553
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix TreatWarningsAsErrors for linux #106549
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Bump downlevel to 8.0.8 #106548
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Skip static constructors in DynamicallyAccessedMembersBinder #106541
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add JIT Helpers for RISCV64 #106540
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Ignore SYSLIB0057 obsoletion in wasm websocket tests #106527
    area-System.Net.Security
  • JIT: Allow stack allocate objects in loops #106526
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve Guid v7 performance on Unix #106525
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Share implementation of GenerateGuidFromName with EventSourceGenerator.Parser and CoreLib #106519
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • JIT: Emitting more push instructions based on the push size #106516
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Try re-enabling some CoreCLR/NativeAOT tests #106514
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • [release/9.0-rc1] Fallback to treating as object if not collection #106517
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Revert "[browser] Remove check for user agent when attaching debugger" #106426
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Disable MD5 tests on Azure Linux #106554
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement
  • Fixed creating generic type with abstract type when it is has a default constractor constrant #101963
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update debugging-runtime.md #106518
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-rc/1] Downlevel 8.0.9 #106547
    Servicing-approved, area-Workloads
  • [release/9.0-rc1] Remove CONTEXT_XSTATE in FaultingExceptionFrame::UpdateRegDisplay #106550
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Fix Enum field type bug found when underlying type is set from assembly loaded with MLC #106513
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • [GC] Allow distribute_free_regions to decommit and redistribute #106414
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-rc1] JIT: Remove implicit fallthrough assert in bool optimizer #106542
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Update packaging.targets #106490
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/9.0-rc1] JIT: update simd base type when combining simd nodes for bitwise ops #106520
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove CONTEXT_XSTATE in FaultingExceptionFrame::UpdateRegDisplay #106466
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Update `MethodTable::IsDynamicStatics` and `DacpMethodTableData::bIsDynamic` to return 0/1 instead of flag value #106504
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • JIT: Don't try to do hot/cold splitting unless optimizing #106515
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove implicit fallthrough assert in bool optimizer #106492
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Arm64/Sve Test: test randomized masks for LoadVector APIs (#101475) #106449
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove `HelperMethodFrame`s from `Object` methods #106497
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Replace TlsStream type by using SslStream directly #106451
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Fix stack overflow handling with SuperPMI #106495
    area-PAL-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [apple-mobile] Disable TLSWitLoadedDlls for Apple mobile due to missing native libs #106461
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios
  • Remove RefOnly optional msbuild switch #106482
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [cdac] Fix getting free object size in GetObjectData #106505
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • JIT: update simd base type when combining simd nodes for bitwise ops #106510
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fallback to treating as object if not collection #106378
    area-Extensions-Configuration

Updated

  • Add Base64Url fuzzer #106509
    area-System.Buffers
  • Track generic instantiations in ILLink #106370
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [GC] Handle growing global_regions_to_decommit lists #106168
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Ensure XML doc comments exist for the nested classes and IsSupported properties for intrinsics #106091
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • [wasm] Allow to build browser in library mode #106388
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • Split dotnet/runtime-only downlevel LibraryImport support into its own source generator #106436
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 10.0.0
  • Fix stack overflow in the configuration source gen #106511
    area-Extensions-Configuration, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • Remove managed interfaces impls defined in CoreCLR #105965
    area-Interop-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • ILLink analyzer: add warnings for DAM on type #105994
    area-Meta
  • [NO MERGE] Update the CPUID and XSAVE logics for APX #104637
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix Issue #105820 #106440
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Copy published crossgen2 in artifacts/tests #80154
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Make all of the trimmer aware of recursive interfaces #103317
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 10.0.0
  • Make GetPropertyCount public and fix its return value #106503
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Inject IJW Copy Constructor calls in the JIT instead of in the IL stubs #106424
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [cdac] Basic ISOSDacInterface::GetMethodDescData #106413
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2517422 #105829
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Fix Type System Equivalence Checks #106498
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Ensure that integer parsing correctly handles non-zero fractional data #106506
    area-System.Runtime
  • [Tar] Fill in the file size even if the file is empty. #106409
    community-contribution, area-System.Formats.Tar
  • SunOS process and thread support #105403
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-SunOS, community-contribution
  • ILLink: Rebuild override info after custom step runs #104566
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 10.0.0
  • [RISC-V][LoongArch64] Pass structs containing empty struct arrays according to integer calling convention #106266
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • [wasm] Clean emsdk setup #106403
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • GC cleanup #105517
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Run native aot runtime tests on cet compatible machines #105288
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add Azure 3.0 helix test #106330
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [feature/9.0-cdac-backports] Data descriptor changes for GetMethodDescName #106463
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • JIT: Cast UInt64 to Single directly during const folding #106419
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Instrumentation #100294
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Disallow types with property names conflicting with metadata. #106460
    area-System.Text.Json, 10.0.0
  • Use ProjectReferences in libs #106329
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add Ubuntu 24.04 Helix Images to pipeline #106048
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Improve performance of interface method resolution in ILC #103066
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [cdac] Fix getting array function type in RuntimeTypeSystem.IsArrayMethod #106512
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [cdac] Add helper methods to Target for reading UTF-8/16 strings #106483
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-16
entry.content:
PullRequests

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] support `System.Net.Http.HttpClient` on WASIp2 #2614
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] add support for building WASI and browser debug & release on Linux #2605
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support for `dotnet store --package <packageName>.nupkg` #42808
  • Implement DevDeviceId generation and transmission #42804
    9.0.1xx
  • Maui Blazor Hybrid web app space in name error #42799
  • .NET SDK installer UI always displayed in wrong launguage #42780
  • Could not load file or assembly 'Microsoft.DotNet.Cli.Utils' #42779

Closed

  • Double writes when performing a PublishAOT publish #30093
    9.0.1xx
  • NuGet package documentation files are not published with project #2393
    Discussion
  • Modification of project file properties / items in targets #2340
    Discussion

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'main' #42807
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update stage 0 to fix cppcli tests #42806
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • model info, version, and other structures more how S.CL wants them to be modeled #42801
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Backport of auditSources fix #42800
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Create Pipe Server per Test Application in dotnet test #42785
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • Enable 9.0.1xx branch for SDKDiffTests and LicenseScanTest #42784
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Enable tab-completion for nuget package versions #42777
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Implicit version update to the live version for RC1 #42745
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] .NET Source-Build 9.0.100-preview.7.24407.1 August 2024 Updates #42798
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enabled codeflow through 9.0.1xx #42766
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Remove the install of all runtimes 5.0 and below. #42327
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Alpha Branding #42743
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Clean up some code #42775
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.4xx #42701
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Send "workload set not installed" messages #42683
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • .NET Source-Build 9.0.100-preview.7.24407.1 August 2024 Updates #42699
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add analyzer redirecting proposal #42437
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #42736
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Support launchSettings.json workingDirectory with dotnet run #42534
    untriaged, Area-CLI

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EditorConfig "modern" vs legacy priority revert related documentation updates #74789
    17.12 P2
  • Advanced analysis options are unreliable, confusing and poorly documented #74788
  • Sourcelink does not debug merged partial classes #74787
  • Inconsistent report of CS8156 when using generically constrained interfaces and [UnscopedRef] #74785
    17.12

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-35215.202 #74783

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix issue where output path set in construction never updated the project update state #74791
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Reduce allocations in CSharpSyntaxFacts.AppendMembers (again) #74790
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • 17.11 cherry-pick: fix bug with on-the-fly-docs option not working when clicked (#74781) #74786
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Test removal of net45 #74784
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Expose trigger in argument list option to vscode #74792
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Use EnableCodeStyleSeverity instead of AnalysisLevel to control new diagnostic severity behavior #73843
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Report field diagnostic as warning, only report when ambiguous, and only with preview language version #74729
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix Copilot option bug #74781
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Reduce allocations from newline information allocated by ChangedText.GetLinesCore #74728
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Do not run 'remove unnecessary imports' on generated code #74762
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add file watchers for analyzer references #74745
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Migrate Codelens provider to .NET #74321
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Move net451 test assets to net461 #74766
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Make host outputs public #74750
    Area-Compilers, Needs API Review
  • EditorConfig comments cannot follow a property value #51625
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Editor Config, VSCode
  • Update LSP Protocol Types #73911
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, VSCode

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Initial Styles don't load correctly On new project when there's a spacing between project name on visual studio #57375
  • Retry Http3RequestTests.POST_Expect100Continue_Get100Continue #57373
  • Perf regression: json_middleware #57371
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #57370
  • [Blazor]AuthenticationState inside component return Authenticated as true after SignOut #57368
  • Blazor - Authentication cookie in a webapi call in the same project #57367
  • [Blazor] ValidationSummary component. Support the equivalent of ModelOnly in MVC #57365
  • Test failure: no exception in UserManagerWillUseTokenProviderInstanceOverDefaults #57361
  • Test failure: no exception in ResultsOfTResult1TResult2_Throws_InvalidOperationException_WhenResultIsNull #57360
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef, json #57359
  • StreamRendering partial DOM Preservation #57358
  • InputDate Docs has a broken list #57357
    Backlog
  • Validate or sanitize client-controlled inputs to the JwtBearer WWW-Authenticate header #57356

Closed

  • ASP.NET Identity Core 2.1 - User can verify multiple times with the same two factor token #14423
    AuthPlanning
  • Expose method for testing for a local URL consumable without depending on MVC #56770
    Backlog
  • AsNonRenderingEventHandler + ErrorBoundary = unexpected behavior #54543
    9.0-rc2
  • IEmailSender does not exist in Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity.UI when targeting .NET 7/.NET 6 #57364
  • Shared project files marked as content are inconsistent on debug and after being published on Blazor WebAssembly Standalone App. #57146

PullRequests

Created

  • Unquarantine EnhancedFormThatCallsNavigationManagerRefreshDoesNotPushHistoryEntry #57376
    area-blazor
  • Retry POST_Expect100Continue_Get100Continue #57374
    area-infrastructure, HTTP3, area-networking
  • [Blazor] Fix navigation lock tests #57372
    area-infrastructure
  • Add `StringSyntax` to the `RouteAttribute` #57369
    area-blazor
  • feat: DefaultOutputCachePolicyProvider added #57362
    community-contribution, area-networking, area-middleware

Merged

  • Add RedirectHttpResult.IsLocalUrl() #57363
    area-minimal, area-networking, 10.0-preview1
  • Fix CanBindToFormWithFiles #57355
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 10.0-preview1
  • Update branding to 10.0 #57340
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Perf improvement: Fix Cumulative Layout Shift issue in blank Blazor templates #57213
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 10.0-preview1
  • Use System.Threading.Lock in Kestrel #57236
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • [release/8.0] Use 7.* IdentityModel package in val pipeline #57349
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • Upgrade xunit version to 2.9.0 #57303
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/2.1] (deps): Bump modules/EntityFrameworkCore from `74055e1` to `268817f` #56008
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 2.1.x
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #57339
    area-infrastructure
  • Middleware/Rewrite: Update XML comments for "AddRedirect" to indicate status code. #57224
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking, area-middleware

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Testing] Resolve FlyoutHeaderAdaptsToMinimumHeight Failures #24284
    Backlog
  • System.TypeLoadException (System.Reflection.AssemblySignatureKeyAttribute) when debugging on iOS #24283
  • [9.0 Preview 7, Android and Windows] XamlC fails in Debug with _MauiForceXamlCForDebug but works in Release #24282
    9.0-rc1
  • [Debug Mode Performance] XAML parsing events #24280
    Backlog
  • Entry no focus possible when table section title is set #24279
    Backlog
  • Unexpected Syntax Error in blazor.webview.js on iOS lower than v17 in .NET 9 Pre7 #24278
  • [MAUI]I9_Scrolling_Scroll mode when adding items page throws' Java.Lang.IllegalArgumentException Message=Invalid target position' after setting UpdatingScrollMode #24272
    .NET 8 SR9
  • Unable to deploy to latest IOS device #24271
  • Fix CollectionScrollToGroupWorks #24270
    .NET 8 SR9

Closed

  • Hot Reload fails to update XAML when Keyboard property is present #24010
  • [iOS, .NET 9.0 Preview 7] Border size changes are animated on iOS #24287
  • [Windows] `CollectionView` throws NRE when `ScrollTo` method is called from a handler of event `Window.Created` #17865
    .NET 8 SR9
  • Add a CanSwipe property to SwipeView #24235
  • Targeting Android SDK 33 but seen error related to targetSDK=35 (Android.App.MissingForegroundServiceTypeException) at runtime. #24260
  • NavigationPage BackButtonPressed sent ignores Android OnBackPressed #15296
    Backlog
  • Application configuration is invalid (.NET MAUI/Windows) #24242
  • [regression/8.0.3] Using Samsung.Tizen.Sdk/7.0.129 with .NET 7 projects fails to build #18837
    Backlog
  • The bug of LinearItemLayout for CollectionView #23936
  • How to disable vertical moving of collection view on ios? #23134
  • InitializeComponent () System.InvalidCastException: Unable to cast object of type 'Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Binding' to type 'System.Boolean'. #23998

PullRequests

Created

  • [Android] Add test for scroll without group #24288
    platform/android 🤖, i/regression
  • Try and make scroll-to test more solid #24286
  • [Windows] Optimize `WrapperView` #24281
    community ✨
  • [Windows] - Picker on windows shows "Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Picker" if ItemsSource has an empty string #24276
    community ✨
  • fix 23921 #24275
    community ✨
  • Fixed the label text from being cut off from the top when the specified LineHeight. #24273
    community ✨

Merged

  • [Windows] Fix crash using ScrollTo on CollectionView #19921
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview
  • [android] improve performance of `StrokeExtensions` #24267
    platform/android 🤖, t/perf
  • [android] cache `Join` and `Cap` enum values #24248
    platform/android 🤖, t/perf
  • Fix cake scripts to work locally #24111

Updated

  • [Android] Removing TapGestureRecognizer with at least 2 taps causes Exception - fix #21714
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-gestures
  • [iOS] Fix Button image sizing and layout #22476
    platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area-controls-button
  • [net9.0] Fix API23 Core device tests #24128
    testing-green-ci
  • Wrap Image with a container on Windows so that it is centered with AspectFill #17665
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-image
  • [Windows] Make `WebView.CaptureAsync()` work #23474
    community ✨
  • Null guard in `ShellFlyoutTemplatedContentRenderer.HeaderContainer.UpdateMinimumHeight` #16573
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, stale
  • Fixed FlyoutItemIsVisible is not working with bindings #24212
    community ✨
  • Improve performance and stability of `BindableLayout` #23136
    area-layout, community ✨
  • [iOS] Bugfix/22469 ios label crash #22487
    community ✨, area-controls-label
  • Replace Deprecated BeginImageContextWithOptions with UIGraphicsImageRenderer #18631
    platform/iOS 🍎, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-essentials, legacy-area-controls, stale
  • Build the previous TFMs #23896
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-rc1
  • Add styling and Shell to Blazor Hybrid template #24253
    area-templates
  • [net9.0] Fix loop CarouselViewHandler2 #24230
  • UI testing doc changes #24165
    area-docs
  • Fix "Grey" cannot be used to set Background property #24197
    community ✨
  • Match behavior of compiled bindings with indexers to their counterparts #24256
  • CarouselView doesn't scroll to the right Position after changing the ItemSource with Loop enabled #24142
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Add Device logs to Integration Tests #24268
  • Fix Stepper doesn't change increment value when being bound to a double in MVVM context (Windows) #24156
    community ✨
  • [Android] Fix SearchBar presentation taken whole screen size in horizontal screen orientation #24198
    community ✨
  • 894511 : Shell Tab is still visible after set Tab.IsVisible to false #24161
    community ✨
  • 899474: Entry/Editor completed event is not triggered properly when unfocused #24207
    community ✨
  • [IOS ]Fix border has an unexpected background animation #24227
    community ✨

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Customizing migration detection and generation #34454
  • Use case-insensitive comparison for `StoreObjectIdentifier` during model validation for SQL Server #34453
    Backlog

Closed

  • EF reduce usage of memory #33117
  • Owned entity with ForeignKey throws exception from ModelSnapshot when applying migration #34386
  • Configuration of Entities using inheritance that add incoming relationships to a base entity without any real discriminator #34368
  • SQL Server geography elevation (Z) is not updated #34290
  • How to use custom annotations through migrations #34049
  • Correct Approach to generate ef core 8 migrations programmatically on runtime with previous snapshots #34087

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix github-merge-flow #34452
  • Code cleanup (3) #34451
    tell-mode

Merged

  • Update branding to 10.0.0-alpha1 #34438

Updated

  • Basic FSharp test project and a single test. #34372
